name: Jimmy Kamikaze
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Jimmy Kamikaze - a game in which the child wants to swim in the water, but does not know how. You need to help the child do this by breaking the right blocks, so that the child slides down into the water. Avoid falling to the ground.

Features:

★ achievements;
★ Pleasant graphics;
★ simple operation;
★ Interesting gameplay;
★ Easy music;
★ unforgettable adventures;
★ availability in 2 languages;
★ 30 levels
★ 3 types of blocks: broken, mobile, fixed

Control
Click on the wooden blocks to break them.
The child will fall down into the water!
F for the full screen. ESC to cancel full screen mode
